column1: '''''Parma Nölé'' 8''' is the eighth issue of the [[North East Tolkien Society]] journal ''[[Parma Nölé]]''.
* Letters from the Chairman and Co-chair of the Heren Istarion
* "Pippin Skywalker": "The Bilbo and Frodo Birthday Celebration September 2003"
* [[Emily Newhouse]] and Constance Shuchardt: "Poetry and Art Corner"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "Games Workshop Product Spotlight: A Review of the Return of the King set"
